Package org.uzh.ase.quiz.service

Class QuizService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.uzh.ase.quiz.service.QuizService
  • @Service
public class QuizService
extends java.lang.Object
    This service is responsible to build the quiz objected which is returned by the QuizController.
